DOC.brief_title: Phase I Pilot Study Biodistribution , Metabolism Excretion Novel Radiotracer 18FFluorthanatrace ( FTT ) PET/CT
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Biodistribution cohort Participants ≥ 18 year age History know suspect epithelial ovarian , fallopian tube , primary peritoneal cancer ( may primary metastatic cancer time study enrollment ) At least one lesion ≥ 1.0 cm see standard imaging ( e.g . CT , MRI , ultrasound , FDG PET/CT ) Participants must inform investigational nature study willing provide write informed consent participate study accordance institutional federal guideline prior studyspecific procedure . Exclusion Criteria Biodistribution cohort Females pregnant breast feeding time screen eligible study ; urine pregnancy test perform woman childbearing potential screening . Inability tolerate image procedure opinion investigator treat physician Any current medical condition , illness , disorder assess medical record review and/or selfreported consider physician investigator condition could compromise participant safety successful participation study Inclusion Criteria Dynamic cohort Participants ≥ 18 year age History know suspect epithelial ovarian , fallopian tube , primary peritoneal cancer ( may primary recurrent cancer time study enrollment ) At least one lesion ≥ 1.0 cm see standard imaging ( e.g . CT , MRI , ultrasound , FDG PET/CT ) Clinical plan biopsy surgical procedure least one site know suspected cancer Willing consent collection pathology tissue purpose research time clinical biopsy surgical procedure . Participants must inform investigational nature study willing provide write informed consent participate study accordance institutional federal guideline prior studyspecific procedure . Exclusion Criteria Dynamic cohort Females pregnant breast feeding time screen eligible study ; urine pregnancy test perform woman childbearing potential screening . No clinical plan biopsy surgical procedure know suspected cancer Inability tolerate image procedure opinion investigator treat physician Any current medical condition , illness , disorder assess medical record review and/or selfreported consider physician investigator condition could compromise participant safety successful participation study
